definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Brita in grant her colony independence in the year after the second world war.
sentences.chinese: 二进制战后的年代理英国准许其殖民地独立。

sentences.english: So just as a little sanity check, number 15 in binary would be?
sentences.chinese: 再来做个测试，那么二进制中15怎样表达？

sentences.english: In chapter 3, it focus on the binary model of Artificial Immune System.
sentences.chinese: 第3章就集中介绍了人工免疫系统的二进制模型。

sentences.english: Binary source data must be a single-dimensioned array of unsigned char.
sentences.chinese: 二进制源数据必须是一维的无符号字符数组。

sentences.english: These notations, of course, do not change the bit representation of the value, which is always binary.
sentences.chinese: 当然这些进制不会改变其二进制位的表示形式。

sentences.english: Stuxnet is computer code, bits of binary electronic data.
sentences.chinese: Stuxnet是电脑编码，二进制的电脑数据。

sentences.english: It is a binary operator and can take at most two arguments.
sentences.chinese: 它是一个二进制的操作符，最多只能接受两个参数。

sentences.english: Figure1 gives a diagrammatic representation of the steps in analysing a binary statically for the presence of malicious behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 图1给出静态分析二进制代码检查恶意行为的图示。

sentences.english: The Hamming distance between two integers is the number of positions at which the corresponding bits are different.
sentences.chinese: 两个整数的汉明距离是指其二进制不相等的位的个数。

sentences.english: Computers use a binary code, or base-2 system, to convey information.
sentences.chinese: 计算机使用二进制的代码或基2码系统来传达信息。

sentences.english: Of or relating to a system of numeration having2 as its base.
sentences.chinese: 表示二进制信息的一种信道编码方法。

sentences.english: It is source code for developers. No binaries at this time.
sentences.chinese: 这只是为开发者提供源码，没有二进制文件。
为什么存在二进制不兼容性？

sentences.english: We use only binary protocols because they are the most efficient.
sentences.chinese: 我们只使用二进制协议，因为它们更加有效。

sentences.english: The network design used a recursive decomposition approach and was based on the binary splitting concept.
sentences.chinese: 该网络采用了循环重建法，以二进制扩散概念为基础。
下载预编译的二进制映像。

definition: complementary code/binary code with 0 and 1 interchanged
